entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023
